text: mysql-python install problem using virtualenv, windows, pip
I'm trying to install mysql-python in a virtualenv using pip on windows.
At first, I was getting the same error reported here, but the answer there worked for me too.
Now I'm getting this following error:
_mysql.c(34) : Fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'config-win.h': No such file or directory

childList.text: _mysql.c(34) : Fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'config-win.h': No such file or directory

text:
edit:
If I symlink (Win7) to my regular (not the virtualenv's) python's site-packages/MySQLdb dir I get Error loading MySQLdb module: No module named _mysql.

childList.text: Error loading MySQLdb module: No module named _mysql

text: I'm rather at a loss here.
